title: Would like to downgrade this T3 Cobb

posts.post_title: Would like to downgrade this T3 Cobb
posts.post_content:
Would like to downgrade this card to finance other purchases. Grade doesn't matter, eye appeal does. Raw is fine.

If interested, contact me at [url]drumback2@gmail.com[/url]

Wow

Great looking card.

Good luck with it
